Core module¶

Grid class¶

class profitroll.core.grid.Grid(Lx, Ly, Nx, Ny, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

This class encodes the 2D spatial grid used for the whole simulation.

Parameters

  • Lx (float) – Length (in m) of the x-axis of the rectangle grid

  • Ly (float) – Length (in m) of the y-axis of the rectangle grid

  • Nx (int) – Number of subdivisions of the x-axis of the rectangle grid

  • Ny (int) – Number of subdivisions of the y-axis of the rectangle grid

State class¶

class profitroll.core.state.State(t, vrs={})¶

Bases: object

This class encodes an object which contains all the variables at a given time t.

Parameters

  • t (float) – Corresponding time

  • vrs (dictionary) – Dictionary of the variables and their values

classmethod copy(otherState)¶

Creates a copy of an other State object

Parameters

otherState – State object to copy :type otherState: State object

classmethod fromCDF(netCDF_file, k=None)¶

Other constructor method which construct a State object from a netCDF file

Parameters

  • netCDF_file – NetCDF file used to create the State object :type netCDF_file: Dataset at NETCDF4 format

  • k (int, optional) – time rank of the state to create in the NetCDF file, defaults to None

save(netCDF_file, saved_vrs=None, backup=False, k=None)¶

Save the state into a given NetCDF file.

Parameters

  • netCDF_file – NetCDF file where the State object will be saved :type netCDF_file: Dataset at NETCDF4 format

  • saved_vrs – list of the variables to save, defaults to None (all the variables are saved) :type saved_vrs: list of str, optional

  • backup (bool, optional) – True if this is the NetCDF backup file (the previous states are erased), else the state is simply addded, defaults to False

  • k (int, optional) – time rank given to the state in the netCDF file , defaults to None (added at the end)

History class¶

class profitroll.core.history.History(state_list)¶

Bases: object

This class encodes the list of State objects useful at each simulation step (evolving through simulation)

Parameters

  • state_list (List of State objects) – List of State objects

  • size (int) – Length of state_list

append(state)¶

Adds a State object at the end of the state_list

Parameters

state (State object) – This state will be added at the end of the state_list

classmethod fromCDF(netCDF_file)¶

Other constructor method which construct a History object from a netCDF file

Parameters

netCDF_file (Dataset at NETCDF4 format) – NetCDF file used to create the History object

pop(k=None)¶

Removes a State object from the state_list

Parameters

k (int, optional) – The (k+1)-th element of the state_list will be removed, if None the first element is removed, defaults to None

save(netCDF_file, backup=False, saved_variables=None)¶

Saves the first state of state_list in a netCDF file (or the entire state_list if backup is True)

Parameters

  • netCDF_file (Dataset at NETCDF4 format) – File where the state will be saved

  • backup (bool, optional) – if False, the first state of state_list is added to the netCDF file . if True the netCDF file state informations are replaced by the complete state_list, defaults to False

  • saved_variables (list of str ,optional) – List of the variables (str) which will be saved, if None, all the variables are saved, defaults to None

Simulation class¶

class profitroll.core.simulation.Simulation(initialCDF, methods, methods_kwargs, output_folder, save_rate=[], backup_rate=[], T=[], Nt=[], verbose=0, saved_variables=None, name=None, frombackup=False, pre_resultCDF=None)¶

Bases: object

This class encodes the simulation

Parameters

  • history (History objects) – List of states useful at each iteration (evolving through simulation)

  • params (dictionary) – Dictionary of specific parameters useful to the simulation

  • grid (Grid object) – The 2D spatial grid used for the simulation

  • methods (list of functions) – list of the methods used at each iteration of the simulations

  • methods_kwargs (list of dictionaries) – list of dictionaries containing the arguments useful to each method used at each iteration of the simulations

  • output_folder (str) – Path to the folder where the result and backup netCDF files will be saved

  • T (list of float, optional) – list of the time duration of the simulations that have been launched, defaults to empty list

  • Nt (list of int, optional) – list of the number of time step of the simulations that have been launched, defaults to empty list

  • save_rate (list of int, optional) – list of the save rates of the simulations that have been launched, defaults to empty list

  • backup_rate (list of int, optional) – list of the backup rates of the simulations that have been launched, defaults to empty list

  • name (str, optional) – name of the simulation (which will contained in the result and backup files names), defaults to creation time

  • saved_variables (list of str, optional) – list of the names of the variables that will be saved (if None all the variables will be saved), defaults to None

  • verbose (int, optional) – Amount of informations that will be printed when running the simulation, defaults to 0

forward()¶

One step of simulation : apply each method to the history.

classmethod frombackup(backupCDF, methods, methods_kwargs, output_folder, resultCDF=None, name=None, saved_variables=None, verbose=1)¶

Other constructor method which construct a Simulation object from a backup netCDF file. Informations to end the last simulation launched will be printed.

Parameters

  • backupCDF (Dataset at NETCDF4 format) –

  • methods – list of the methods used at each iteration of the simulations :type methods: list of functions

  • methods_kwargs (list of dictionaries) – list of dictionaries containing the arguments useful to each method used at each iteration of the simulations

  • output_folder (str) – Path to the folder where the result and backup netCDF files will be saved

  • resultCDF (Dataset at NETCDF4 format, optional) – Previous result file, defaults to None

  • name – name of the simulation (which will contained in the result and backup files names), defaults to creation time :type name: str, optional

  • saved_variables – list of the names of the variables that will be saved (if None all the variables will be saved), defaults to None :type saved_variables: list of str, optional

  • verbose – Amount of informations that will be printed when running the simulation, defaults to 1 :type verbose: int, optional

run(T, Nt, save_rate, backup_rate, first_run=True)¶

Run a simulation for given time.

Parameters

  • T (float) – Duration of the simulation

  • Nt (int) – Number of time steps

  • save_rate (int) – Rate of save in the result file

  • backup_rate (int) – Rate of refresh of the backup file

  • first_run (bool, optional) – True if it is the first run of this simulation (for save purpose), defaults to True

netcdf_creator¶

profitroll.core.netcdf_creator.create_results_netcdf(path, initialCDF, params, grid, T, Nt, methods, methods_kwargs, save_rate, backup_rate, **kwargs)¶

Creates a netCDF file where simulation informations will be saved

Parameters

  • path (str) – Path where the netCDF file will be created

  • initialCDF (Dataset at NETCDF4 format) – File from which the variables of the problem will be copied

  • params (dictionary) – Dictionary containing informations about the simulation that will be saved in the new netCDF file

  • grid (Grid object) – The 2D spatial grid used for the simulation

  • T (list of float) – list of the time duration of the simulations that have been launched

  • Nt (list of int) – list of the number of time step of the simulations that have been launched

  • methods (list of functions) – list of the methods used at each iteration of the simulations

  • methods_kwargs (list of dictionaries) – list of dictionaries containing the arguments useful to each method used at each iteration of the simulations

  • save_rate (list of int) – list of the save rates of the simulations that have been launched

  • backup_rate (list of int) – list of the backup rates of the simulations that have been launched

profitroll.core.netcdf_creator.results_netcdf_frombackup(path, backupCDF, pre_resultCDF, **kwargs)¶

Completes a netCDF file with the previous results (until the last backup)

Parameters

  • path (str) – Path of the new netCDF result file

  • backupCDF (Dataset at NETCDF4 format) – File used to know until when the simulation was safe (and copy the previous results)

  • pre_resultCDF (Dataset at NETCDF4 format) – File from which the previous values of the variables will be copied
